Blogs.title: The outcome of Prague on visas and a possible training mission for Ukraine
Blogs.content: This was the backdrop for our discussions with EU Defence and Foreign Ministers in Prague on 29-31 August. These were informal meetings.
Blogs.author: Uri Geller

Blogs.title: The outcome of Prague on visas and a possible training mission for Ukraine
Blogs.content: This was the backdrop for our discussions with EU Defence and Foreign Ministers in Prague on 29-31 August. These were informal meetings, so no decisions were taken.
Blogs.author: Kpine

Blogs.title: The outcome of Prague on visas and a possible training mission for Ukraine
Blogs.content: This was the backdrop for our discussions with EU Defence and Foreign Ministers in Prague on 29-31 August. These were informal meetings, so no decisions were taken. However, we had important debates where we managed to make progress, including on issues .
Blogs.author: Chris
